text: @WhiteHouse TRUMP is a Fool  who ignores SCIENCE and SCIENTISTS what an idiot?from Climate change to Covid19 this incompetent brainless President lies to Americans daily and spouts rubbish and lies Republicans should never be reelected for supporting this criminal conman TRUMP
